sentences.sContent: This year’s conference will be held at the Hilton Hotel.
sentences.sCn: 今年的会议将在希尔顿酒店召开。

sentences.sContent: A thanksgiving ceremony was held to mark the occasion.
sentences.sCn: 举行了一个感恩仪式以庆祝这一特别的时刻。

sentences.sContent: The funeral was held on a grey day in November.
sentences.sCn: 葬礼在11月的一个阴天举行。

sentences.sContent: In April, the President held talks with Chinese leaders.
sentences.sCn: 4月，总统和中国领导人举行了会谈。

synos.tran: 持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制

phrases.pCn: 不挂断电话，等一下；继续
暂停；尚未办理的事情；等候接听；把持住的（指有问题的）
坚持；伸出；提供；维持；抵制；主张；[美口]扣留
紧紧抓住，抓住不放；保持住

words.tran: 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物

trans.tranCn: 握，抓；支持；装得下；认为；举行
trans.tranOther: to have a meeting, party, election etc in a particular place or at a particular time
